alert.note: Alert for Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 30 at 4:01PM CDT until March 30 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LEFLORE COUNTY... At 401 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Lambert to near Sunnyside, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Leflore County, including the following locations... Schlater. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
